docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    runlevels.md
    resize_ext4.md       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.title: shrinking an ext4 partition
docs.text:
1. resize to the minimum size
e2fsck -f /dev/<partn>
resize2fs -M /dev/<partn>
  1. expand the partition, as below

docs.title: re-create the partition with fdisk or gdisk:
docs.text:
1. note the starting sector value of the target partition
  2. delete the target partition + possibly other in the required space
  3. re-create the target partition:
    • same partition number
    • starting sector: the same sector
    • ending sector: new value, larger than size

docs.title: extend the partition to fill the new size
rescue (single user mode)
docs.text: warning: in single user mode - a single tty terminal (use tmux) - network is down (NO SSH)

docs.title: boot in single-user mode
docs.text:
edit temporarily linux .. GrUB entry and add at the end of line:

[linux ..] systemd.unit=rescue.target

docs.title: boot in multi-user mode
docs.text:
edit temporarily 'linux ..' GrUB entry and add at the end of line:

[linux ..] systemd.unit=multi-user.target
